## RelayedTransactionV2Builder.build() method

Tries to build the relayed v2 transaction based on the previously set fields. It returns a transaction that isn't signed

**Signature:**

```typescript
build(): Transaction;
```
**Returns:**

[Transaction](./sdk-core.transaction.md)

## Exceptions

ErrInvalidRelayedV2BuilderArguments

ErrGasLimitShouldBe0ForInnerTransaction  Transaction
